name: What Animal Are You?
description: Discover your spirit animal based on your personality traits!

questions.text: How do you prefer to spend your free time?

answers.text: Relaxing at home with close friends

questions.text: When facing a difficult problem, you...

answers.text: Analyze it from every angle before acting
Trust your instincts and act quickly
Take your time and wait for the right moment
A luxury resort where you're treated like royalty
A solo backpacking trip through mountains
Camping in the wilderness with a small group
A cozy cabin in the woods for relaxation

questions.text: In a group project, you usually...

answers.text: Prefer to work on the strategic vision

questions.text: What quality do you value most in others?

personalityBuckets.label: Lion
personalityBuckets.description: The king of the jungle, natural born leader

results.title: You are a Lion!
results.description: You're a natural born leader with confidence and charisma. People look up to you for guidance and direction. Your presence commands respect, and you're not afraid to take charge when the situation calls for it.
results.shareText: I'm a Lion! ü¶Å Natural born leader with confidence and charisma. What animal are you?

personalityBuckets.label: Eagle
personalityBuckets.description: Soaring high, seeing the big picture

results.title: You are an Eagle!
results.description: You have a visionary mind and see things others miss. Your ability to analyze situations from a higher perspective makes you invaluable. You value independence and soar above the noise to find clarity.
results.shareText: I'm an Eagle! ü¶Ö Visionary with a big-picture perspective. What animal are you?

personalityBuckets.label: Wolf
personalityBuckets.description: Loyal pack member with sharp instincts

results.title: You are a Wolf!
results.description: Loyalty runs deep in your veins. You're fiercely protective of your pack and have sharp instincts that rarely lead you astray. You thrive in close-knit groups where trust is paramount.
results.shareText: I'm a Wolf! üê∫ Loyal, instinctive, and protective. What animal are you?

results.title: You are a Bear!
results.description: Patient, strong, and grounded. You don't rush into things but when you act, you do so with tremendous power. Your calm demeanor hides incredible strength and protective instincts.
results.shareText: I'm a Bear! üêª Strong, patient, and grounded. What animal are you?
